developer._instruction: Add all parties that developed this (meta)data model version. Note that these developers will overwrite the developer list provided for the overarching (meta)data model.

digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this research product version.

isAlternativeVersionOf._instruction: Add all (meta)data model versions that can be used alternatively to this (meta)data model version.

isNewVersionOf._instruction: Add the (meta)data version preceding this (meta)data model version.

license._instruction: Add the license of this (meta)data model version.

serializationFormat._instruction: Add all content types in which (meta)data compliant with this (meta)data model version can be stored in.

specificationFormat._instruction: Add all content types in which the schemas of this (meta)data model version are stored in.

type._instruction: Add the type of this (meta)data model version.
